sentence.text: Anaplastic thyroid cancer (protein phosphorylation) is associated with poor prognosis and is often untreatable.

The abnormal regulation of protein polyubiquitination-483 may play an important role in tumorigenesis, and positive regulation of Rho protein signal transduction is known to regulate cell polarity, cell migration, and cell division.

entity.text: positive regulation of Rho protein signal transduction

sentence.text: Tumor proliferation promoted by the regulation of protein polyubiquitinationNA expression can be regulated in thyroid cancer by upregulating transforming growth factor-β1 (TGF-β1), which is thought to interact with protein targeting to membrane.
When compared with adjacent non-tumor tissues, we found that protein polyubiquitination-483 was upregulated and protein targeting to membrane was downregulated in 80 thyroid tumor samples.
